page.title: 10Industry
page.content:
Industry
Ilford's industry is centred mainly around Plesseys. They deal with war heads, torpedoes, bombs, engines, parts of planes and parts of boats. Radar is another thing that Plesseys deal with. A radar is something that tracks down guided missiles. They send radar systems and guided missiles all over the British Isles and abroad too. Plesseys employ a large amount of people so it helps keep down unemployment in Ilford. Howard's is a chemical industry that was originally based in Ilford. During the building at Uphall pieces of Roman pottery and coins were found. In 1916 they added Aspirin to a long list of pharmaceutical products.
